thread.title: Karen Crossley
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Karen Crossley

author: Karen Crossley
title: Karen Crossley
text: Tour to Spain Portugal and Morocco was good value for money. Lots of time spent travelling but with the distance covered it was not surprising. Lovely guide with a very broad range of knowledge and concise trip notes. Company was very professional and helpful
